alert.note: Alert for Eastern Greene; Schoharie; Western Albany; Western Greene (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 6:56PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Albany, northern Greene and southeastern Schoharie Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 656 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Gilboa to Windham. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Windham, Gilboa, Preston-Potter Hollow, Preston Hollow, Cairo, Durham, Conesville, Durso Corner, East Durham, Norton Hill, Greenville Center, Manorkill, Broome Center, Smith Corner, Sunside, Five Corners, North Settlement, Place Corners, Lambs Corner and Oak Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Greene; Schoharie; Western Albany; Western Greene
